posts.text: If my "millionaire as a person holding a jar of fleas in front of Everest" has a jar 20 fleas deep, that jar probably contains thousands of fleas. reply_context.text:
The problem with this analogy is that you're inviting the reader to conflate height and mass.

My immediate response to your post was to envision a millionaire as someone holding a jar of 20 fleas in front of Everest, but that's incorrect: I need to envision a stack 20 fleas tall.
